original_text: And the messengers returned to Jacob, saying, We came to thy brother Esau, and also he cometh to meet thee, and four hundred men with him.
korean_text: 사자들이 야곱에게 돌아와 이르되 우리가 주인의 형 에서에게 이른즉 그가 사백 명을 거느리고 주인을 만나려고 오더이다

sentences.original_text: And the messengers returned to Jacob
We came to thy brother Esau
and also he cometh to meet thee
and four hundred men with him
